====Usage notes====
The word for ''bixie'' (chimaera-like figure common in Chinese and Persian art) in Mandarin is also pronounced bìxié, but is written {{zh-l|辟邪}} which, like {{zh-l|避邪}}, can also ''mean ward off evil spirits''.
